casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Aaron Ross TAYLOR 237P18-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. August 2, 2018 Ms. Hannah H. Love, Assistant Appellate Defender, for Taylor, Aaron Ross

Mr. Glenn Gerding, Appellate Defender

Ms. Kathryn E. Hathcock, Assistant Attorney General, for State of North Carolina Mr. Ben R. David, District Attorney, for State

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 1st of August 2018 by Defendant for Temporary Stay:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 2nd of August 2018."
